task.summary: First Commit checklist: 1) Added missing files in pom.xml 2) Prepared skeletal code for endpoints in "UserController" class 3) Generated JPA entities for 'users' and 'user_auth' table
Second Commit checklist: 1) Generated skeletal service class for signup endpoint. 2) Implemented UserDao class. 3) Implemented RestExceptionHandler for handling exceptions.
Second Commit checklist: 1) Generated skeletal service class for signup endpoint. 2) Implemented UserDao class. 3) Implemented RestExceptionHandler for handling exceptions.
Third Commit : Completed code for "SignupBusinessService" for signup endpoint.
Third Commit : Completed code for "SignupBusinessService" for signup endpoint.

Fourth Commit : Completed code for "UserController" class for signup endpoint. -- signup endpoint successfully completed -- Additional comments: 1)Change postgres password in: a)application.yaml file in quora-api b)localhost.properties in quora-db 2) Please change javaassist jar file to version 3.22.0 for Java8, no changes required for Java11.

Fifth commit checklist : 1) Completed AuthenticationBusinessService for "signin" endpoint. 2) Completed code for "signin" endpoint in UserController class.
---- signin endpoint class completed -----

Final commit for User Controller : 1) Generated "SignOutBusinessService" for signout endpoint. 2) Completed code for "signout" endpoint in UseController class. 3) Added comments. ---- signout endpoint completed ---- ------User Controller completed --------- Additional Comments: Removed javaassist files for java11.

MESSAGE.value: First Commit checklist: 1) Added missing files in pom.xml 2) Prepared skeletal code for endpoints in "UserController" class 3) Generated JPA entities for 'users' and 'user_auth' table
Second Commit checklist: 1) Generated skeletal service class for signup endpoint. 2) Implemented UserDao class. 3) Implemented RestExceptionHandler for handling exceptions.
Third Commit : Completed code for "SignupBusinessService" for signup endpoint.

Fourth Commit : Completed code for "UserController" class for signup endpoint. -- signup endpoint successfully completed -- Additional comments: 1)Change postgres password in: a)application.yaml file in quora-api b)localhost.properties in quora-db 2) Please change javaassist jar file to version 3.22.0 for Java8, no changes required for Java11.

Fifth commit checklist : 1) Completed AuthenticationBusinessService for "signin" endpoint. 2) Completed code for "signin" endpoint in UserController class.
---- signin endpoint class completed -----

Final commit for User Controller : 1) Generated "SignOutBusinessService" for signout endpoint. 2) Completed code for "signout" endpoint in UseController class. 3) Added comments. ---- signout endpoint completed ---- ------User Controller completed --------- Additional Comments: Removed javaassist files for java11.
